EmailTemplate.name: RE: Recycling Presentations for Tower Companies (1328558285.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Recycling Presentations for Tower Companies (1328558285.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Russell,
Congratulations! Now you should respond to her and introduce me to her via email. I will then reach out to her by phone and explain our process. You can say something like
“At this point in the process I would like to introduce you to my back office, MBO Partners, who handles all the billing for me. Sara Conde will be reaching out to you.”
So excited for you Russell! ___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: russell.klein.101@gmail.com [mailto:russell.klein.101@gmail.com] On Behalf Of Russell Klein Sent: Monday, February 06, 2012 1:04 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Fwd: Recycling Presentations for Tower Companies
Sara,
Good afternoon.
So what should happen next??
Russ
---------- Forwarded message ---------- From: Eugenia Gregorio <eugenia.gregorio@towercompanies.com> Date: Mon, Feb 6, 2012 at 10:29 AM Subject: Recycling Presentations for Tower Companies To: Russell Klein <klein@russellkleinassociates.com> Cc: Eugenia Gregorio <eugenia.gregorio@towercompanies.com>, Debbie Webb <debbie.webb@towercompanies.com> Russell – I spoke with Property Management and they would like to do Option B for now at all downtown buildings during Earth Week and we will consider Option A for future. The presentations would be 1 hour (including Q&A) and over lunch time between 12pm and 1pm. We will find a tenant conference space to use for the presentations at each building, so they won’t be in the main lobby space. Can you provide an agenda outlining the major topics to be discussed during your presentations?
We would also like to do this at another commercial office building in Maryland, 1101 Wootton Parkway. Would you be able to do this for Maryland based on Montgomery County and City of Rockville regulations too? We can’t do single stream here in Montgomery County, unfortunately, so that is a big difference with our D.C. buildings.
Please let me know.
Thanks!
Eugenia.
Eugenia Gregorio, LEED AP BD+C SUSTAINABILITY MANAGER 2000 Tower Oaks Blvd., Ninth Floor Rockville, Maryland 20852 Main: 301.984.7000 Direct: 301.692.1463 Fax: 301.692.1558 Mobile: 301.922.3071 eugenia.gregorio@towercompanies.com www.towercompanies.com P Please consider the environment before printing this e-mail.
From: russell.klein.101@gmail.com [mailto:russell.klein.101@gmail.com] On Behalf Of Russell Klein Sent: Friday, January 27, 2012 5:30 PM To: Eugenia Gregorio Subject: Re: FW: Recycling Presentation - Questions
Eugenia,
Here is my proposal. Don't stay in the office too long!
Have a great weekend. Russell Klein Tel. (202) 505-2520 _______________________________________
Your Source for Resource Management and Training.
Russell Klein, President and LEED AP Russell Klein and Associates, LLC www.RussellKleinAssociates.com
